targets.query: SELECT last("lane_laser_bias_current_high_alarm"), last("lane_laser_bias_current_high_warning"), last("lane_laser_bias_current_low_warning"), last("lane_laser_output_power_high_alarm"), last("lane_laser_output_power_high_warning"), last("lane_laser_output_power_low_alarm"), last("lane_laser_output_power_low_warning"), last("lane_laser_receiver_power_high_alarm"), last("lane_laser_receiver_power_low_alarm"), last("lane_laser_receiver_power_high_warning"), last("lane_laser_receiver_power_low_warning"), last("lane_laser_bias_current_low_alarm"), last("lane_rx_loss_of_signal_alarm"), last("lane_tx_loss_of_signal_alarm"), last("module_temp_high_alarm"), last("module_temp_high_warning"), last("module_temp_low_alarm"), last("module_temp_low_warning") FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "if_name"::tag

SELECT last("optic_model"), last("optic_vendor"), last("optic_vendor_part"), last("optic_serial_no"), last("optic_func_type"), last("optic_fault_condition") FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~ /^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ and "channel"='no') AND $timeFilter and optic_desc != '' group by optic_desc

SELECT last("optic_model"), last("optic_vendor"), last("optic_vendor_part"), last("optic_serial_no"), last("optic_func_type"), last("optic_fault_condition") FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "sub_ports"::tag =~ /^.*${ifname:regex}.*$/ and "channel"='yes') AND $timeFilter and optic_desc != '' group by optic_desc
SELECT last("frequency")*1000000 as freq FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("wavelength_setpoint") as wave FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("port_speed") as speed FROM "INTERFACES_ETH" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "rx_dbm" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ AND "channel"::tag = 'no') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "lane_number"
SELECT "rx_dbm_oc" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/  AND "channel"::tag = 'yes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "lane_number"
SELECT "tx_dbm" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/  AND "channel"::tag = 'no') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "lane_number"
SELECT "tx_dbm_oc" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ AND "channel"::tag = 'yes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "lane_number"
SELECT mean("rx_dbm") as RX FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name" =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ and "channel"='no') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY lane_number, time(60s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("rx_high_warn") as HIGH_WARN, mean("rx_low_warn") as LOW_WARN FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "if_name" =~/.*${ifname:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("rx_dbm_oc") as RX FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name" =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/  and "channel"='yes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY lane_number, time(60s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("rx_high_alarm") as HIGH_ALARM, mean("rx_low_alarm") as LOW_ALARM FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "if_name" =~/.*${ifname:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("tx_dbm") as TX FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name" =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ and "channel"='no') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY lane_number, time(60s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("tx_high_warn") as HIGH_WARN, mean("tx_low_warn") as LOW_WARN FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "if_name" =~/.*${ifname:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("tx_dbm_oc") as TX FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name" =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ and "channel"='yes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY lane_number, time(60s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("tx_high_alarm") as HIGH_ALARM, mean("tx_low_alarm") as LOW_ALARM FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "if_name" =~/.*${ifname:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("current_temp") as Temperture  FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "if_name" =~/.*${ifname:regex}.*$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("temp_high_warn") as HIGH_WARN, mean("temp_low_warn") as LOW_WARN FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "if_name" =~/.*${ifname:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("temp_high_alarm") as HIGH_ALARM, mean("temp_low_alarm") as LOW_ALARM FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "if_name" =~/.*${ifname:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s) fill(null)
SELECT "prefec_instant" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "fec_corrected_bits_rate" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name" =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/  and "channel"='no') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "fec_corrected_bits_rate" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "sub_ports" =~/^.*${ifname:regex}.*$/  and "channel"='yes') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "optic_fec_uncorrectable_blocks_rate" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name" =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/  and "channel"='no') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "optic_fec_uncorrectable_blocks_rate" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "sub_ports" =~/^.*${ifname:regex}.*$/  and "channel"='yes') AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("osnr_instant") FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s) fill(null)
SELECT "chroma_instant" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "pola_loss_instant" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "2nd_pola_instant" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag=~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "transport_optic_cur" FROM "COMPONENTS" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "if_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex}.*$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transport_optic_name"
SELECT "in_octets_rate"*8 FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "out_octets_rate"*8 FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~/^.*${ifname:regex} .*$/ ) AND $timeFilter

list.definition: show tag values from INTERFACES_ETH with key="SHORTNAME" where $timeFilter
list.label: Router
list.name: rtr
list.query: show tag values from INTERFACES_ETH with key="SHORTNAME" where $timeFilter

list.definition: show tag values FROM COMPONENTS with key="port_name" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/ and $timeFilter and optic_desc=~/.*(ZR|zr).*/
list.label: Phy. Port with ZR/ZR+ optic
list.name: port
list.query: show tag values FROM COMPONENTS with key="port_name" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/ and $timeFilter and optic_desc=~/.*(ZR|zr).*/

list.definition: show tag values FROM COMPONENTS with key="port_name" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/ and port_name=~/^${port:regex}$/ and $timeFilter
list.label: cage
list.name: ifname
list.query: show tag values FROM COMPONENTS with key="port_name" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/ and port_name=~/^${port:regex}$/ and $timeFilter
